speakersYaml.name: Mason Egger
speakersYaml.biography: Mason is currently a Developer Advocate at DigitalOcean who specializes in cloud infrastructure, distributed systems, and Python. Prior to his work at DigitalOcean he was an SRE helping build and maintain a highly available hybrid multicloud PaaS. He is an avid programmer, speaker, educator, and writer/blogger. He is an avid open source enthusiast and conetn creator. In his spare time he enjoys reading, camping, kayaking, and exploring new places.

talks.title: The Enters and Exits of Context Managers
